NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-Div.I(Vol.II) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
‘A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN , NEW DELHI 
Date: 11/11/2009 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR No.15 / 2009 
 
 
SUBJECT:- 
ACCESS OF VEHICLES IN RESPECT OF HIS HOLINESS                
SRI JAYENDRA SARASWATHI SWAMIGAL UPTO THE TARMAC 
AT AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON MEDICAL   GROUNDS. 
 
 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 14/2008 dated 24.11.2008, His 
Holiness Sri Jayendra Saraswathi Swamigal is hereby permitted to take his vehicle 
up to the tarmac, during Arrival/ departure at all airports in the country, on medical 
grounds for a further period of one year w.e.f 24.11.2009. 
 
 
 
     
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  (M. Malaviya) 
IPS 
     Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf. 
 
Copy to :  
 
1. 
MCA(Shri L.R.S Reddy, Director), Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan,New Delhi.  
2. 
 Shri C.V Sarma, ( Srikaryam & Agent), No.01, Salai Street, Kanchipuram-631 502
